message.body: Could you do my Sunday PM this week and I take your Monday on sept 22?
Also would you be able to ride Titan on Monday?
Yes and yes! So pm this Sunday the 14th, ride titan Monday the 15th, then you do the 22nd, yeah?
Yes maaam! Thank you!! You could if you wanted take Titan for a walk on Sunday too but no real work since we have Seneca on Saturday.
Ok I might do that if $ is still out of commission. Have a blast tomorrow!
